allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: complete global localization and premium splash architecture

- Add full i18n support with 480+ translation keys \(EN/TR\)
- Implement LaserSplashScreen with animated V logo
- Fix all localization type mismatches and missing keys
- Update widget files with AppLocalizations integration
- Add missing ARB keys: nameRequired, amountHint, updateDecision, etc.
- Fix EmptyState.reports\(\) message parameter
- Update test file with localeProvider requirement

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C c:/flutter_projects/mmr_app commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: currency system overhaul

- Currency selection \(TRY, USD, EUR, GBP, SAR\)
- Dynamic currency ticker based on selected currency
- Smart expense input toggle \(income vs display currency\)
- Cross-rate calculations from TCMB API
- Gold: gram for TRY, oz for others
- Localized hour abbreviation \(h/sa\)
- Splash screen: removed logo, video fade out
- Expense model: originalAmount/originalCurrency fields
- Currency exports from models barrel

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git -C c:/flutter_projects/mmr_app commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
docs: update CLAUDE.md with currency system documentation

- Currency selection and provider details
- Expense input currency toggle logic
- Dynamic currency ticker behavior
- API cross-rate calculations
- New files and todo list

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(for class in PremiumColors PremiumDecorations PremiumShadows GradientBorder GlassCard ShimmerEffect BreatheGlow SparkleFloat RotatingGradientBorder PremiumButton LevelProgressBar SmartBadge RadialGradientOverlay AnimatedCountUp AnimatedProgressBar StaggeredSlideUp ScaleFadeIn PulseGlow FrostedGlass GlassModalSheet GlassButton GlassChip NeonText GlassDivider AnimatedPageContent)

## Summary

- Liquid Glass visual polish across 11 high-traffic surfaces
- iOS 26 Liquid Glass UI migration across 6 components
- App Store readiness fixes: remove `.env` from bundled assets, replace `print\(\)` with `debugPrint\(\)`, fix VantagWidget deployment target \(26.2â†’15.5\), pin `uuid` dependency, update force update version to 1.0.4

## Test plan
- [ ] `flutter analyze` passes with no errors
- [ ] `flutter build ios --release` builds successfully
- [ ] App launches on simulator â€” `.env` loading works in debug
- [ ] Verify no `print\(\)` calls in live_activity_service.dart
- [ ] Verify VantagWidget deployment target is 15.5
- [ ] Visual QA across all updated screens and widgets

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code]\(https://claude.com/claude-code\)

Bash(git -C /Users/gencayalla/development/vantag commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add locale-aware currency formatting and selector to onboarding

- Add CurrencyAwareInputFormatter that uses Currency model''s thousand/decimal
  separators \(TRY/EUR use dots, USD/GBP/SAR use commas\)
- Add tappable currency selector with picker sheet on onboarding Step 2
- Auto-detect default currency from device locale \(including European fallback to EUR\)
- Reformat salary input value when switching currencies
- Pass selected currency to CurrencyProvider and IncomeSource on setup completion
- Add onboardingCurrencyHint and onboardingCurrencyProInfo l10n keys \(EN + TR\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
